SELECT f.id,f.investor_id as userId,u.user_name as userName,u.mobile , f.product_amount as saleAmount,f.fee_rate as feeRate, f.fee_amount as feeAmount,f.create_time as createTime, p.product_name as productName,p.org_number as platfrom,o.`name` as platfromName , p.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, p.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, p.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, p.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, p.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tcim_product p on f.product_id=p.product_id LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info o on p.org_number=o.org_number LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on f.investor_id=u.user_id where f.profit_cfplanner_id=#{query.userId} and f.fee_type='1001'
and (u.user_name = #{query.name} or u.mobile= #{query.name})
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by f.id desc

and (u.user_name = #{query.name} or u.mobile= #{query.name})

SELECT f.id,f.fee_amount as amount,f.create_time as createTime, p.activity_name as activityName from tcim_fee f LEFT JOIN tsm_activity_list p on f.bill_id=p.activity_code LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on f.investor_id=u.user_id where f.profit_cfplanner_id=#{query.userId} and f.fee_type='1008'
and p.activity_name = #{query.name}
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by f.id desc

SELECT f.id,f.user_id as userId,u.user_name as userName,u.mobile , f.invest_amt as saleAmount,f.create_time as createTime,f.end_time endTime, p.product_name as productName,p.org_number as platfrom,o.`name` as platfromName , p.is_fixed_deadline AS isFixedDeadline, p.dead_line_min_value AS deadLineMinValue, p.dead_line_max_value AS deadLineMaxValue, p.dead_line_min_self_defined AS deadLineMinSelfDefined, p.dead_line_max_self_defined AS deadLineMaxSelfDefined from tcim_product_invest_record f LEFT JOIN tcim_product p on f.product_id=p.product_id LEFT JOIN tcim_org_info o on p.org_number=o.org_number LEFT JOIN tcrm_user_info u on f.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN tcrm_investor i on i.user_id=f.user_id where i.cfplanner=#{query.userId} and f.`status`=1
and (u.user_name = #{query.name} or u.mobile= #{query.name})
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.startTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(f.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endTimeForSearch}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by f.id desc
